text: The Purple Line (or the Evanston Line) of the Chicago Transit Authority is a route on the northernmost section of the Chicago "L" rapid transit system. Normally, it extends south from Linden Avenue in Wilmette, passing through Evanston to Howard Street, on Chicago's north side. In 2016, the average weekday boardings on the Purple Line was 10,187. ==References== ==Other websites== * Purple Line at CTA official site Category:Transport in Chicago Category:1949 establishments in the United States Category:1940s establishments in Illinois
title: Purple Line (CTA)
